input.sentences: wedding day ! all the guests have arrived and are anticipating the beautiful bride walking down the isle .
the cameraman is ready to catch it all .
the bride makes her appearance | and she looks stunning !
after the ceremony lots of wedding photos are taken .
the reception was full of fun and laughter for the happy couple .
output.sentences: THE WEDDING IS ABOUT TO START AND EVERYONE IS WAITING FOR THE BRIDE TO COME DOWN THE AISLE
THE CAMERAMAN IS READY TO CATCH ALL THE PERFECT MOMENTS OF THIS HAPPY EVENT
SHE JUST MAKES AN ABSOLUTE STUNNING BRIDE.
AFTER THE WEDDING CEREMONY LOTS OF PICTURES WHERE TAKEN
THE RECEPTION WAS FULL OF LAUGHTER AND HAPPY PEOPLE IT WAS A WONDERFUL EVENT
